author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
title: Coronavirus: Lockdown 'must become the social norm'
description: "Social pressure from others" will be key in persuading the UK to stay at home, a study suggests.
content:
Image copyrightGetty Images
To persuade the majority to continue to comply with the lockdown to slow the spread of coronavirus, it must become the only "socially acceptable norm", a King's College London study suggests. 
"Social pressure from others" had an… [+2522 chars]
